title: Portfolio Website
description: Showcasing selected works in web development, UI/UX design, and software.

title: CodeHub Application
description: CodeHub is a comprehensive platform designed for developers to share, discover, and collaborate on code snippets. With support for 70+ programming languages, advanced search capabilities, real-time messaging, and a modern UI/UX, CodeHub provides an intuitive and feature-rich environment for all your code sharing needs.

title: NatureGrain Application
description: NatureGrain is a comprehensive full-stack e-commerce platform specifically designed for organic food retail. This modern web application provides a seamless shopping experience for customers seeking premium organic products while offering powerful administrative tools for business management.
